pages.terms-conditions: Terms of Use - Rules and Guidelines for All-In Championship Players All-In Championship Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Write Terms of Use Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by All-In Championship. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. You acknowledge and agree that All-In Championship shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such third-party websites or services. Prohibited Activities You agree not to use our website for any purpose that is prohibited by these Terms or by applicable law. Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to: Using any automated means, including but not limited to, scripts, bots, or macros, to participate in our tournaments or to collect information from our website. Using our website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. Using our website to transmit, distribute, or store any material that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable. Using our website to impersonate any person or entity or to falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity. Using our website to interfere with or disrupt the operation of our website or any servers or networks connected to our website. Using our website to violate any applicable local, state, national, or international law or regulation. User Content You are solely responsible for any content, including but not limited to, text, images, or videos, that you post or transmit on or through our website. You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary licenses, rights, consents, and permissions to use and authorize us to use all patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright, or other proprietary rights in and to any and all such content. You agree not to post or transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable. pages.about: About Us - Meet the Team Behind All-In Championship All-In Championship Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Write About Us At the All-In Championship, we are dedicated to providing the ultimate poker experience. Founded by passionate poker players, our mission is to create a platform that brings together the global poker community in a thrilling and competitive environment. Our Vision: Our vision is to elevate the game of poker by organizing world-class tournaments that challenge and inspire players of all levels. Our Team Founder: Jane Doe - A seasoned poker player with over 20 years of experience in the industry. CEO: John Smith - Leading the team with innovative strategies and a passion for poker. Head of Operations: Emily Johnson - Ensuring smooth and efficient tournament execution. Marketing Director: Michael Lee - Driving our brand with creative campaigns and global outreach. Lead Developer: Sarah Brown - Building a secure and user-friendly platform. Community Manager: David Wilson - Connecting with our players and fostering a vibrant community. Our Commitment Excellence and Integrity Excellence: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our operations, from the design of our platform to the organization of our tournaments. Integrity: We uphold the highest standards of integrity, ensuring a fair and transparent playing environment for all participants. Our Achievements Global Reach We have hosted tournaments with participants from over 50 countries, making us a truly global platform. Participate in the tournament Prize Money Over $10 million in prize money awarded to date, changing the lives of our players. Participate in the tournament Player Satisfaction Consistently high player satisfaction ratings, reflecting our commitment to delivering an exceptional poker experience. Participate in the tournament All-In Championship All-In Championship © 2024 | Elevate Your Game | Play Responsibly Our links Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Additional links Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use our site, you accept our cookie policy. Please verify your age. I confirm document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () { const agePopup = document.getElementById("age-popup"); const confirmButton = document.getElementById("confirm-age"); if (!localStorage.getItem("ageConfirmed")) { agePopup.style.display = "flex"; } if (confirmButton) { confirmButton.addEventListener("click", function () { localStorage.setItem("ageConfirmed", "true"); agePopup.style.display = "none"; }); } });
pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer - Legal Information for All-In Championship Participants All-In Championship Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Write Disclaimer User Conduct All-In Championship expects its users to conduct themselves in a respectful and appropriate manner while using our website and participating in our tournaments. You agree not to use our website or tournaments for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, or in any way that violates the rights of others. This includes, but is not limited to, engaging in any form of harassment, intimidation, or discrimination based on race, gender, religion, or any other protected characteristic. All-In Championship reserves the right to terminate or suspend the account of any user who violates these standards of conduct. Payment and Refund Policy All-In Championship may charge a fee for participation in certain tournaments. Payment for these tournaments must be made in advance through our designated payment processor. All payments are final and non-refundable, except in the case of a tournament cancellation by All-In Championship. If a tournament is cancelled by All-In Championship, we will refund the full amount of the entry fee to the user's account. All-In Championship is not responsible for any losses incurred as a result of technical issues, disconnections, or other interruptions during a tournament. Privacy Policy All-In Championship is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. We collect certain personal information from users, such as name, email address, and date of birth, in order to provide our services and administer our tournaments. We may also collect information about users' activity on our website and use of our services. This information is used for internal purposes only and is not shared with third parties except as required by law or in connection with the administration of our tournaments. Users may request access to their personal information or request that it be corrected or deleted by contacting us at allinchampionship@gmail.com. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless All-In Championship, its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents from any and all claims, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of or related to your use of our website or participation in our tournaments, your violation of this disclaimer or any applicable law or regulation, or your violation of the rights of any third party. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about this disclaimer or any aspect of the All-In Championship website or tournaments, please contact us at allinchampionship@gmail.com. All-In Championship All-In Championship © 2024 | Elevate Your Game | Play Responsibly Our links Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Additional links Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use
pages.index: Welcome to All-In Championship - Home of Premier Poker Tournaments All-In Championship Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Write Join the Ultimate Poker Battle All-In Championship Start inspection Why Choose All-In Championship? Welcome to the All-In Championship, the premier destination for poker enthusiasts from around the globe. Experience the thrill, strategy, and excitement of high-stakes poker in an environment designed for both seasoned players and newcomers alike. Exclusive Features: Unparalleled Competition: Face off against the best. Massive Prizes: Win life-changing amounts. Global Community: Connect with players worldwide. Secure Platform: Play with peace of mind. Tournament Structure The All-In Championship offers a variety of tournaments tailored to different skill levels and preferences. Whether you’re a casual player or a high roller, our meticulously structured events ensure a fair and exhilarating experience. Sign up for the tournament Upcoming Events Main Event: Our flagship tournament featuring the largest prize pool and top-tier competition. Satellite Tournaments: Win your way into the main event through smaller, more accessible tournaments. Daily Challenges: Test your skills and win big every day. Get Started Today How to Enter Joining the All-In Championship is simple and straightforward. Follow these easy steps to secure your spot in the tournament: Sign Up: Create your account in minutes. Deposit: Choose from a variety of secure payment methods. Register: Select your preferred tournaments and buy in. Participate Meet Our Champions Hall of Fame John Doe: 2023 Champion - Dominated the field with exceptional skill. Jane Smith: 2022 Champion - Known for her strategic brilliance. Sam Johnson: 2021 Champion - A master of bluffing and reading opponents. Alex Lee: 2020 Champion - Renowned for his aggressive playing style. Join the Poker Elite Register Now Becoming part of the All-In Championship is just a few clicks away. Fill out the form below to start your journey towards poker glory. Location No. 44, Central Bazar Road, Bajaj Nagar, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440010, India Email address allinchampionship@gmail.com Phone +91-712-3592748 I accept the Privacy Policy Send a message All-In Championship All-In Championship © 2024 | Elevate Your Game | Play Responsibly Our links Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Additional links Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - How All-In Championship Protects Your Information All-In Championship Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Write Privacy Policy We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when registering at the All-In Championship expressing an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, when participating in activities on the All-In Championship or otherwise contacting us. The personal information that we collect depends on the context of your interactions with us and the All-In Championship, the choices you make and the products and features you use. The personal information we collect can include the following: Name and Contact Data. We collect your first and last name, email address, postal address, phone number, and other similar contact data. Credentials. We collect passwords, password hints, and similar security information used for authentication and account access. Payment Data. We collect data necessary to process your payment if you make purchases, such as your payment instrument number (such as a credit card number), and the security code associated with your payment instrument. All payment data is stored by our payment processor and you should review its privacy policies and contact the payment processor directly to respond to your questions. All personal information that you provide to us must be true, complete and accurate, and you must notify us of any changes to such personal information. We automatically collect certain information when you visit, use or navigate the All-In Championship. This information does not reveal your specific identity (like your name or contact information) but may include device and usage information, such as your IP address, browser and device characteristics, operating system, language preferences, referring URLs, device name, country, location, information about how and when you use our All-In Championship and other technical information. This information is primarily needed to maintain the security and operation of our All-In Championship, and for our internal analytics and reporting purposes. Like many businesses, we also collect information through cookies and similar technologies. We use the information we collect or receive: To facilitate account creation and logon process. If you choose to link your account with us to a third party account *(such as your Google or Facebook account), we use the information you allowed us to collect from those third parties to facilitate account creation and logon process for the performance of the contract. To send you marketing and promotional communications. We and/or our third party marketing partners may use the personal information you send to us for our marketing purposes, if this is in accordance with your marketing preferences. You can opt-out of our marketing emails at any time. To send administrative information to you. We may use your personal information to send you product, service and new feature information and/or information about changes to our terms, conditions, and policies. Fulfill and manage your orders. We may use your information to fulfill and manage your orders, payments, returns, and exchanges made through the All-In Championship. All-In Championship All-In Championship © 2024 | Elevate Your Game | Play Responsibly Our links Home About Us Why are we Tournament structure Additional links Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use
